src:
Buntut Ricuh Demo di Hong Kong: Stasiun Dibakar, Kantor Berita Dirusak
03 Nov 2019, 09:58 by Rakhmad Hidayatulloh Permana
Hong Kong - Polisi dan petugas kebersihan Hong Kong melakukan bersih-bersih usai aksi demo. Ada beberapa bangunan yang dirusak dan stasiun yang dibakar.
Sebagaimana dilansir Reuters, Minggu (3/11/2019) pada hari sebelumnya para demonstran membakar Stasiun Metro dan merusak bangunan. Kantor Berita China Xinhua, juga tak lepas dari target perusakan.
Setidaknya sejauh ini sudah ada 200 demonstran ditangkap. Aksi kucing-kucingan antara demonstran dan polisi anti huru hara berlanjut hingga dini hari Minggu pagi usai pembubaran dengan tembakan gas air mata.
Beberapa staf kebersihan terlihat menyapu kaca yang berserakan di lantai melalui pintu dan jendela yang rusak. Kegiatan bersih-bersih itu juga jadi tontonan wisatawan yang lewat.
text:
Aftermath Ricuh Demo in Hong Kong: Station Burned, News Agency Destroyed
03 Nov 2019, 09:58 by Rakhmad Hidayatulloh Permana
Hong Kong - Hong Kong police and janitors clean up after the demonstration. There were several buildings that were damaged and the station burned.
As reported by Reuters on Sunday (3/11/2019) on the previous day the demonstrators set fire to the Metro Station and damaged the building. China Xinhua News Agency, also can not be separated from the target of vandalism.
At least so far there have been 200 demonstrators arrested. Cat and mouse action between demonstrators and riot police continued until early Sunday morning after the dissolution with tear gas.
Several cleaning staff were seen sweeping the glass scattered across the floor through broken doors and windows. The clean-up activity also becomes a spectacle for tourists passing by.
